```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(kableExtra)
```

```{r}
icc_table <- readRDS(here::here("objects/icc_table.rds"))
```


```{r}
#| label: tbl-icc
#| tbl-cap: Intraclass correlation coefficients for sexual consent cue use.

icc_table <- icc_table %>%
  mutate(
    ICC = ICC |> str_replace("^0\\.", "."),
    `1 - ICC` = `1 - ICC` |> str_replace("^0\\.", "."),
    `95% CI` = `95% CI` |> str_replace("\\b0\\.", ".")
  )

icc_table %>%
  kbl(
    booktabs = TRUE,
    align = c("l", "c", "c", "c")
  ) %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = FALSE)
```
